Class VendingMachine

java.lang.Object
VendingMachine
Direct Known Subclasses:
SpecialVendingMachine
public class VendingMachine extends Object
This class represents a template for creating a vending machine. The vending machine contains cash, item slots, and keeps track of transactions.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    VendingMachine(String N, Slot[] iS, int c)
    Constructs a new VendingMachine object with the given name, item slots, and cash capacity.

    • VendingMachine

      public VendingMachine(String N, Slot[] iS, int c)
      Constructs a new VendingMachine object with the given name, item slots, and cash capacity.
      Parameters:
      N - Name of the vending machine.
      iS - Item slots of the vending machine.
      c - Cash capacity of the vending machine.

  • Method Details

    • resetCashCollected

      public void resetCashCollected()
      Resets cash collected by the machine

    • getCashCapacity

      public int getCashCapacity()
      Retrieves the cash capacity of the vending machine
      Returns:
      Cash capacity of the vending machine.

    • organizeMoney

      public void organizeMoney(ArrayList<Cash> c)
      Organizes cash into an array list of cash collected by the machine.
      Parameters:
      c - Cash to be organized.

    • insertMoney

      public void insertMoney(Cash c)
      Organizes cash into an array list of cash inserted into the machine.
      Parameters:
      c - Cash to be inserted.

    • getNAME

      public String getNAME()
      Retrieves the name of the vending machine
      Returns:
      Name of the vending machine

    • organizePayment

      public void organizePayment(Cash c)
      Collects money from the user and organizes it in the cashInserted list. If the denomination of the cash matches any existing denomination in the cashInserted list, it increments the quantity of that denomination.
      Parameters:
      c - Cash collected from the user.

    • collectCash

      public void collectCash()
      Clears the cashInserted list by setting the quantity of every denomination to 0. It also organizes the collected cash into the cashCollected list to keep track of the total cash collected.

    • setCashInserted

      public void setCashInserted(ArrayList<Cash> c)
      Sets the cash inserted into the vending machine.
      Parameters:
      c - The ArrayList of Cash to be set as the amount of cash inserted into the machine.

    • prepareMoney

      public ArrayList<Cash> prepareMoney()
      Creates an initialized array list of cash with the denominations accepted by the machine.
      Returns:
      A Cash ArrayList that has been initialized.

    • calculateValue

      public static float calculateValue(ArrayList<Cash> cI)
      Calculates the total value of the given array list of cash.
      Parameters:
      cI - Array list of cash.
      Returns:
      The total value of cash in the array list.

    • giveChange

      public ArrayList<Cash> giveChange(float price, ArrayList<Cash> cashVal)
      Calculates and returns the change in denominations to be given to the user after a purchase.
      Parameters:
      price - Price of the item bought.
      cashVal - Cash inserted by the user.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Cash representing the change in denominations.

    • getCashAmount

      public ArrayList<Cash> getCashAmount()
      Retrieves the cash available in the machine
      Returns:
      Cash available in the machine

      Retrieves the cash inserted in the machine
      Returns:
      Cash inserted in the machine

      public Slot[] getItemSlots()
      Retrieves the item slots of the vending machine
      Returns:
      Item slots of the vending machine

      public void dispenseItem(Slot iS)
      Displays text to dispense item
      Parameters:
      iS - Item to be dispensed

    • restockItem

      public void restockItem(Slot s, int q)
      Restocks an item in the specified slot with the given quantity.
      Parameters:
      s - Slot with the item to be restocked.
      q - Quantity of items to be restocked.

    • getRestockCount

      public int getRestockCount()
      Retrieves the restock count of the vending machine.
      Returns:
      Restock count of the vending machine.

    • replenishMoney

      public void replenishMoney(ArrayList<Cash> c)
      Replenishes the cash in the machine by adding the specified cash to the existing cash.
      Parameters:
      c - Cash to be added to the machine.

    • addTransaction

      public void addTransaction(Transaction t)
      Adds a new transaction to the list of transactions in the vending machine.
      Parameters:
      t - Transaction to be added.

    • findSlot

      public int findSlot(int slotNum)
      Searches for the slot index based on the given slot number.
      Parameters:
      slotNum - Slot number to search for.
      Returns:
      The index of the slot if found, otherwise -1.

    • FindSlot

      public Slot FindSlot(int slotNum)

    • stockItem

      public boolean stockItem(Item item, int quantity, int slotNum)
      Stocks an item in the specified slot with the given quantity.
      Parameters:
      item - Item to be stocked in the slot.
      quantity - Quantity of items to be stocked.
      slotNum - Slot number to stock the item.
      Returns:
      True if the item is successfully stocked, otherwise false.

    • getTransactions

      public ArrayList<Transaction> getTransactions()
      Retrieves the list of transactions in the vending machine.
      Returns:
      List of transactions in the vending machine.
